name: Asteroid Jump
description:
Asteroid Jump was started as a Flappy Bird Clone I was building for practice but quickly turned into an exploration of the Flappy Bird Mechanics. 

Asteroid Jump is a Flappy Bird inspired game where you must continue to collect fuel for your jetpack, while avoiding asteroids to continue playing.

The game was designed and originally developed by Bobby V. Klein, and polished (by providing new art assets and improved mechanics) by S. Galih
